_source.text: 7. Joni Mitchell - "Big Yellow Taxi" Born Roberta Joan Anderson in Fort Macleod Alberta, Canada she is better known for her stage name - Joni Mitchell.

text: 7. Joni Mitchell - "Big **Yellow** Taxi" Born Roberta Joan Anderson in Fort Macleod Alberta, Canada she **is** **better** **known** **for** her stage name - Joni Mitchell.
